attributes.action: Declare whether trans women have the right to safe spaces.
attributes.additional_details: Since the SC ruling on what is a woman, there has been a lot of talk in Parliament regarding a ban on trans people using safe spaces of their acquired gender. These discussions are often ended by saying trans people have the same rights as everyone else, but there's no talk about anything being done to make sure those rights are upheld. As a trans woman I am concerned that I, and my brothers and sisters, are being placed in unnecessary danger as part of a political battle and seek reassurance.
attributes.background: We want the Government to answer one simple question. Do trans men and trans women have the same right to safe spaces in public buildings as cis men and women?

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Give trans people legal access to single-sex spaces of their acquired gender
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725515
